version_description:
I've spent the last few weeks perfecting this free update - I hope it helps you smash your fitness goals! If you have a moment, please leave a written review on the App Store - your feedback makes all the difference. Previously left a review? Once you've tried out the newest version, you can update it. Thank you!

What's new with this update?

• Resolved iOS8 timer glitch

• Improved user navigation

• Introduced Adrian James Thermoblaze Challenge

The ultimate bodyweight workout just got better! With added motivation and reminders, plus enhanced design and functionality, you’ll never want to miss another workout.

This update includes:

• Updated for iOS 10
• Native resolutions for all current iPhone models
• Numerous bugs squished
• More responsive and accurate workout session
• Improved social sharing integration
• Makes use of 3D Touch technology (on compatible devices)
• Motivational quotes to spur you on
• More intelligent challenge management

If you love the new, improved Adrian James Bootcamp, please leave an App Store review. Your feedback makes all the difference.

The ultimate bodyweight workout just got better! With more challenging and responsive workout sessions, plus enhanced design and functionality, you’ll never want to miss another workout.
